title: Model-Portfolio Assets Hit Record Highs
sub_head: BlackRock added more inflation protection, ‘fallen angel’ bond investments to model portfolios last month, unleashing big fund flows
body:
Assets controlled by model portfolios, or preset investment templates, hit another high as financial advisers increasingly use them to build investor portfolios.
Model portfolios controlled $4.9 trillion of money in U.S. mutual funds and ETFs in September, up from $3.8 trillion a year ago, according to data firm Broadridge Financial Solutions .
